Title: In the Kitchen
Text: I just arrive to the kitchen. I check the fridge and i see that it is almost empty. I also see the food was being prepare so someone is in the house or will arrive soon.
I can also see the living room. I hear something coming from there. I should probably checkout.
I have observed that there is a lot of dirty dishes in the sink.
From the kitchen i can see that there is a door to the outside. It could be open.
